## Result 9

Let $a \in \mathbb{Z}$.  If $7 | 4a$ then $7 | a$

Because 7 is prime, we know:

Suppose $7 | 4a$ then $4a = (2^2)(7)k$ where $k \in \mathbb{Z}$

Therefore $a = 7k$, therefore $7 | a$
